gpt-4.1-nano-2025-04-14.information: OpenAI launched GPT-4.1 family (GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and GPT-4.1 nano) on April 14, 2025. Their context windows are 1 million tokens; knowledge cutoff June 2024. No disclosed parameter counts. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

gpt-5-nano.information: GPT-5 was released August 7, 2025. The model family includes variants (main, mini, thinking etc.) but OpenAI has not disclosed exact parameter counts for publique variants. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

gpt-4.1-mini-2025-04-14.information: Part of the GPT-4.1 family released April 14, 2025. The mini version is intermediate in size between full and nano but parameter counts not disclosed. Context window 1 million tokens. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

gpt-5-mini.information: GPT-5 includes 'mini' variants; formal release date August 7, 2025. Exact parameter counts for mini not publicly disclosed. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

grok-3-mini.information: xAI’s Grok-3-mini (Grok 3 Mini) became available around May 19, 2025 via Azure Foundry. It is a lightweight model with context length ~131,072 tokens; no public parameter count found. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

llama3.1:8b.information: Part of Meta’s LLaMA 3.1 series, released July 23, 2024. One of the model sizes is 8B parameters. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

gpt-oss:20b.information: gpt-oss-20B is an open-weight model by OpenAI recently released; total ~21B parameters. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

llama3.1:70b.information: Meta LLaMA 3.1 70B was released on July 23, 2024. :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}

gemini-2.0-flash.information: No reliable public info found (so far) for Gemini-2.0-Flash regarding parameter count or release date.

gemini-2.5-flash.information: No reliable public info found as yet on Gemini-2.5-Flash’s parameters or exact release date.

gpt-4.1-2025-04-14.information: Full GPT-4.1 (not mini or nano) launched April 14, 2025 with 1M token context, knowledge cutoff June 2024. Parameter count not disclosed. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}

gpt-4o.information: GPT-4o was released November 20, 2024; context window shorter; parameter count not publicly shared. :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}

gemini-2.5-pro.information: No verifiable public data found yet for Gemini-2.5-Pro (release date or parameters).

deepseek-chat.information: DeepSeek (chatbot) by DeepSeek released January 10, 2025. Parameter counts or full model size not clearly disclosed. :contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}

deepseek-reasoner.information: No reliable separate model spec found under the name ‘DeepSeek-Reasoner’ distinct from other DeepSeek variants in public sources.

o3.information: OpenAI’s ‘o3’ model is mentioned in context of newer reasoning models, but public details about release date or parameter counts are scarce or not disclosed.
